Alert Name: bush
Bush plans sanctions against Sudan
President wants to pressure African nation's government in an effort to stop Darfur violence; U.S. also seeks sanctions via the United Nations.
05/29/07 07:56 AM, EDT
President Bush will announce new economic sanctions against Sudan to pressure the government to stop the violence in Darfur, according to a senior administration official Tuesday.
